name: ANOTHER DERBY!
description:
"ANOTHER DERBY!" is a baseball game where you hit a home run and clear the quotas.
Click the approaching ball at the right time to hit a Big-Fly!

~ Synopsis ~
One day, my sister was sucked into a mysterious different space portal that suddenly appeared!
Following her whereabouts, the boy jumps into a different space and challenges further trials…

Game features
  • 100 achievements
  • Unique enemy characters
  • Easy click operation
